column4: xorg is taking up way too much resources when in use.  Does anyone want to point me in a direction?
hello!
anyone familiar with how xorg works?
Just ask your question =)
whats your video card? And are you using the proprietary driver?
I'm not sure.  do you know what i can run to see what i'm using?
Do you know if it is specifically ati or nvidia?
sudo lspci |grep -i nvidia && sudo lspci |grep -i ati
thanks
It should display which you have, and the model # (Only if you have ati or nvidia)
yeah, it looks like i have neither
lspci |grep -i intel
there we go, intel
Do you see anything that could possibly be an intel graphics card?
both had what look to be the same output
sudo lspci |grep -i ati
i see a graphics controller
So you have an ati driver?
i got another similar output when i $lspci |grep -i ati
And what is the output?
want me to make a paste bin for you?
Sure
http://paste.ubuntu.com/201187/  (sorry for the repaste if you already saw this)
